name: AuDOMio
body:
Dynamically generates music by parsing the structure of web sites.  Audio generation done using [Audiolet.js](https://github.com/oampo/Audiolet) and [Music.js](https://github.com/gregjopa/music.js).

During playback, whichever nodes are being used to create a sound are given a random background and border color.

[AuDOMio Bookmarklet](javascript:(function(\){document.body.appendChild(document.createElement('script'\)\).src='http://tchandler.github.io/AuDOMio/AuDOMio.js';}\)(\);) - This will load AuDOMio and begin playing the page.

[AuDOMio Stop Bookmarklet](javascript:(function(\){audioletApp.audiolet.output=null;}\)(\);) - This will stop AuDOMio.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
